alert.note: Alert for Codington; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:25PM MDT until August 10 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAY...NORTHERN CLARK...EAST CENTRAL SPINK AND NORTHWESTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crocker to 6 miles southwest of Bradley to 6 miles northwest of Hillcrest Colony, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Bradley around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Garden City, Swan Lake, Wallace, Florence, Grass Lake and Medicine Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
